flawed_nl_solution:
They scored an average of 720/24=<<720/24=30>>30 points in their previous games
Half that many would be 30/2=<<30/2=51>>51 points
So in the finals, they scored 51-2=<<51-2=49>>49 points
Their opponent thus scored 49-2=<<49-2=47>>47 points
#### 47

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
